quest.name: Mallow in Sadness
journal: Moggzia is looking desperately around the surrounding grass.
A sudden gust of wind has taken Moggzia's precious cloud mallows into its greedy currents. Look for the three pieces that were carried off towards the Mother of the Sheave statue.
You have recovered the three tufts of Moggzia's precious cloud mallow. Return them to the worried moogle.
A noticeable weight lifts off of Moggzia's shoulders when you hand over the mallow tufts he holds so near and dear. It would seem he would have gone hungry without his tufts to use for skyfishing.
objectives: Deliver the tufts of cloud mallow to Moggzia.

dialogue.name: CAREGIVERMOG01836
dialogue.text: Everyone's perked right up thanks to you, kupo!

dialogue.name: LYINGMOGB01836
dialogue.text: I'd probably still be napping if it wasn't for you, kupo!

dialogue.name: LYINGMOGA01836
dialogue.text: Everything is going well over here, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOGGZIA
dialogue.text: Oh, no... Without my cloud mallows, I can't do anything, kupopo!

dialogue.name: MOGGZIA
dialogue.text: My precious cloud mallows were carried off by a sudden gust of wind! The currents carried them off in the direction of the Mother of the Sheave statue. Adventurer, please, recover my three pieces of cloud mallow before I lose my moogle mind, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOGGZIA
dialogue.text: I saw my tufts of cloud mallow fly off in the direction of the Mother of the Sheave statue. My pom-pom is shaking... Please, get them back for me!

dialogue.name: MOGGZIA
dialogue.text: I do hope the beasts around the statue haven't gobbled up my tufts... My precious tufts! <sob>

dialogue.name: MOGGZIA
dialogue.text: <gasp> You found them! You found them! Kupopo! I don't know what I would have done without my cloud mallows! They're perfect for skyfishingâ”€now I won't go hungry, kupo!
